articles.description: The Australian snooker star was furious after the spectator moved while he attempted a shot and made sure he knew about it as the referee also issued a warning
articles.content:
Snooker star Neil Robertson was furious after a fan moved during one of his shots at the Scottish Open.
The former world champion eased to a 4-1 victory in his first round match over Mark Davis and … [+1688 chars]

articles.title: Neymar sums up our feelings towards Casemiro - Man Utd
articles.description: Read what the Brazil striker has tweeted about our man following his sensational winning goal at the World Cup.
articles.content:
The 30-year-old scored a sensational winning goal in his country’s 1-0 success over Switzerland on Monday night to secure their qualification to the World Cup knockout stages.
